Articles.Content: I recently got Chuck Kermin. He'll be like Chuck Yeager and is my official test pilot.

Today I recruited a Merlin Kerman and a Lemmon Kerman

Edit: Just got a Corny Kerman xD

Edited January 16, 2015 by Slam_Jones

well not sure if its cool to the rest of you but i got 2 kernels named cambo and sidlong

they were my main crew for a while ( before my computer bluescrened and deleted ksp and 2 other games along with it)

I recently got Chuck Kermin. He'll be like Chuck Yeager and is my official test pilot.

I got a contract to rescue Chuck from orbit. I took it just to find out, and was very pleased that he did turn out to be a pilot. I would have been very disappointed otherwise.
Sorry if I'm necroing, but I've found a cool one: Han Kerman. Now all we need is Leia Kerman, Anakin Kerman, Obi-Wan kerman and of course... Master Kerman
Sadly, I never god a dildo kerman. Although I do have a mike kerman, and I have him sent around the system to do my dirtiest jobs.

I had a heart attack when I saw Kirrim Kerman in my cue.

Edited January 15, 2015 by greenbow66

Well, I had this guy:

http://usnimi.me/slike/dunabase.png

so, you either killed bill, bob and Jebediah Kerman, and he showed up, or you saw him in your cue and wanted him. Either way, you're a strange person...

I've got to stop flying these guys together, it just gets confusing.

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/swampmonster/Kerbal%20space%20program/NoIsaidlenfry_zps94844f37.jpg

Clearly, they're the comical twin investigators of your space program.

I'm sorry.
I recruited Jongun Kerman earlier. Or perhaps it should be Kerman Jong-Un? He certainly sounds like a Kerean defector
Gerdous and Harman were best friends. Then Harman got lost in space, and Gerdous came back to life (DON'T ASK)

My main Kerbals in my first save were: Genefield, Bobfrod, Dudney, and Seanlock(Yes THE Seanlock from Scott Manley's IQ, but this was before that). Each of them went to the Mun and back. Also in more recent saves my favorite Kerbals were named Rayfrod, Billy-Bobcas, Werhski(Idk is he German or Russian?), Sidski, and finally my favorite one so far is "Badass" Barbo Kerman, leader of the prestigious Bravo Squadron. So those are my awsome Kerbal names that I have found.

Kirrim

Annie

Elliot

Thompble

Randall

Elory (sounds like Elon!)

Corfrey

Harming

Samden

Gus

I have an FNG named Merdock. That makes me laugh.

(cue A-Team theme music)
Is there a file to edit the Kerbal name generator?

Is there a file to edit the Kerbal name generator?

You can go into a file for your save game, press ctrl+f, search ROSTER, and there are the persistence files for your kerbals! You can do whatever you want with them.
Recruited an Almund Kerman yesterday. He and Lemmon are gonna be chefs
You know when you get a name that is either funny, ironic or just sounds cool for a Kerbal? Post them here! Personally, my favorites are Billy-bobbles and Doodbro, because it sounds like "Dude, bro!"

Oh look, it's this thread again.

Fredfred wins anyway.
Bilbo, Samwise, and Merry Kerman are all favorites of mine. Sadly, you cannot get Dandy Kerman (he's a dandy Kerbal... in space). Alas.

Alfredeinrich Kerman.... I didn't save file edit I swear.

The most ironic one I've had come up was "Kerman Kerman". I kept looking at it just to make sure I was seeing things right...
Jimbob kermin
Merging into the Funny/Cool Kerbal names thread.

I recently got one named Rouki Kerman, a pilot. He's my favorite.

Just a few minutes ago he survived a devastating plane crash, actually. He's pretty amazing.
